com.csm.rover.simulator.environments

Class PlatformEnvironment.MapBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.csm.rover.simulator.environments.PlatformEnvironment.MapBuilder
  • Enclosing class:
    PlatformEnvironment<P extends Platform,M extends EnvironmentMap>

    public class PlatformEnvironment.MapBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder pattern object used for the creation of new maps.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • addMapModifier

        public PlatformEnvironment.MapBuilder addMapModifier(EnvironmentModifier<M> mod,
                                                     java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> params)
        Adds a modifier to generation sequence. Modifiers will be applied to the map in the order they are added.
        Parameters:
        mod - Modifier to add
        params - Build parameters for mod
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the modifier has the wrong type

      • addPopulator

        public PlatformEnvironment.MapBuilder addPopulator(EnvironmentPopulator pop,
                                                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> params)
        Adds a new populator image to the environment. Populators should not be built, they will be built as part of generate().
        Parameters:
        pop - The populator to add
        params - Build parameters for pop
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the populator has the wrong type
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the same populator has already been added

      • generate

        public void generate()
        Generates a new map. Map is saved in the environment.
